review: Got this game yesterday when it was on sale and it brings back so many memorys of this game, but it's the first time playing in on PC I used to rent it from my local video store for the Xbox 360 and fill in love, and I fill in love with it all over again.Red Faction Guerrilla is a greate game and is a must have for FPS / sci fi and if you loved games like Half Life then I bet you will love it.
